title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embed endpoints.

title: llama-index-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM integration for local Ollama models; plug into RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed open-webui).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting, managing models and logs.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline GitHub Copilot replacements.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistence support.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Streamlit chat app that compares multiple Ollama models side-by-side.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for vector search.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor or explain code via Ollama models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: One-command docker-compose stack with Ollama, Open-WebUI, Weaviate & Postgres.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama supporting sync, reactive and chat streaming.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK and CLI for Ollama with strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm and answer questions using Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that chats with any Ollama model and supports inline queries.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API exposing Ollama models with token auth and rate limits.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async wrappers over Ollama’s REST API.
